content:
We have 10 fully-funded PhD studentships at the University of Nottingham for next academic year. The members of the FP-lab would like to encourage applications from students interested in topics in category theory, its applications in computer science, and other topics discussed on this site.

Details of the studentships and how to apply: http://www.cs.nott.ac.uk/~pszgmh/phd-advert.txt
